Reviews.Content: This unit is amazing for the price. I was skeptical at first about buying this TV, but don't let the brand name fool you as this is of high quality.Set up is very easy. With some minor adjustments with the picture settings, the TV looks awesome. Only issue that I have found is that when I plugged my sound system up to the TV via the headphone jack, there was a slight buzzing noise coming from the speakers. I was messing around with the settings and the weird thing I found is that if you change the setting of "dynamic backlight" to off, the buzzing sound stops and there is no more issue. Other than that no complaints so far.Good picture, good sound and great price, what is there not to like.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: shana klick
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my bedroom.  Very nice picture and good sound.  Still working out bugs but think it is with DirectTv and the remote.  So far I have been very impressed with the TV and pleased with my purchase.  Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Perfect !
Reviews.Author: Kyosuke Hanakara
Reviews.Content: On first day of use: (12/14/2012)I got the TCL LE32HDE5300 32-Inch 720p Slim LED HDTV and man is it HD; I am doing my review after I plugged in my PC to the TV (via VGA). The picture is better than my Windows 7 Monitor. I just watched The Matrix and tried hooking up my PS2 and they all work perfectly. Games have no lagging like some complained. The audio is not perfect but it's still not as bad as people said. I just plugged in my speakers and problem solved. This is an amazing product that should have cost like $900 but cost under $250. I was very skeptical before I bought this.I will keep you all updated about what happens in the coming months. So far I am one happy customer.____________________________________________________________________________Edit: After about 2 months.....There were a couple reviewers who complained about their sets failing in a month. This was the opposite for me. The TV is in perfect condition and looks amazing as ever. I bought it so that i can use it as a computer screen and that is that  I do.  Many have complained about it having bad sound. Which is true but that is easily fixable. I plugged in my PC speaker and baamm problem solved. For how cheap this thing was, It's a bargain even if the TV speakers were broken. This is the best tv I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Clear Picture
Reviews.Author: Karal B.
Reviews.Content: Awesome for the price. Great for watching sports. They look awesome!I don't have 9 more words, sorry too busy.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful product, limited connections
Reviews.Author: Pair O Cleats
Reviews.Content: The TCL LE42FHDE5300 42 inch HDTV is a beautiful product. It arrived from Amazon very quickly and in perfect condition. The unit, like many less expensive TV's, takes a while to come on after pressing the power button-- about 10 seconds. The picture is fine, has dynamic backlighting for Energy Star rating (which can be turned off). My only disappointments: Only 2 HDMI inputs (a problem because it is not a smart TV so you need some component to stream Netflix etc), NO RCA AUDIO OUTPUT (you have to use the headphone jack and an RCA splitter if you want to go to an analog output, and it is different than as described in the specs on Amazon). The set DOES have a digital coaxial audio out. You will likely WANT to use some form of audio out because the sound is less than vibrant. However, for the price and size, and recognizing that TCL (while being a relatively unknown name) is the fifth largest maker of TV's, I am very happy with this product. The two year warranty is a plus as well. Watch carefully, however, because the TV pricing market is very dynamic, and models are replaced very rapidly!

Reviews.Title: good for the price...update
Reviews.Author: Jane Jarlsberg
Reviews.Content: research on this tv proved correct...the tv seems fine to watch.  but it came missing a key part for the stand, and when i called the customer service number...i was told by a recording i was "first in line"...then after several minutes of waiting, heard a click like someone was picking up my call and was immediately cut off!  this happened several times, so i gave up.  have not had time to try again, but will when i can.  also  the audio on the tv is so bad...staticky and distorted.  fortunately by attaching to my stereo i get decent audio...but not sure that will work when i hook up to satellite tv service later.  it only works on dvds now, not on vhs movies.  i will update later.after using the tv for several weeks, i discovered the audio on the tv was fine, just weak...just got a 'sound bar' for it and the audio has been much improved...i am happy with the tv for the money...but if i could have afforded a 1080p/i i would probably prefer that quality.  but 720 is fine for now...

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: impiouspunk
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about two months and have absolutely zero problems with it. The screen is great (though not stellar). HD programming looks great and even the sound is pretty good. I would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Do not Buy this TV Service terrible
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: I will NEVER buy this again. TV was still under warranty and the screen went out. I had to send it in for repair but it could not be fixed so they were to send me another TV. That was 2 months ago and all I get from Customer Servie is the RUNAROUND. Customer Service is a joke. I have been on hold with them right now for 37 minutes and this is typical. For the last month I have not been able to reach anyone at that number. The last I taked to them I was to have had a replacement TV by 2 Fridays ago. The TV itself is alright for the price but if it does go out don't expect to have your warranty honored. All I get is double talk and the runaround. One more thing is that there are "No Codes" to program the remote for your cable company boxes. You will be stuck with having to use 2 or more remotes. Still on hold at 52 minutes. Pathetic!!!

Reviews.Title: Missing parts on delivery
Reviews.Author: Saurabh
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to getting this TV, but when it arrived it had a part missing.  Now, I will need to return everything.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Steven Hess "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Ordered the 32 LED TCL for my workout room to hang in front of treadmill to watch DirectV HD.  I also have several other HD Tv's all 40" or larger and all more expensive.  This TV simply doesn't compare to a higher end Samsung, Pansonic, LG, etc so a 4 star avg review on this is honestly not the same as a 4 star review on a $500 LED by one of the big names.A Couple of Positives-  This is ACTUALLY a 1080P on the HDMI plugs, 720P applies to the OTA HD Tuner.  You can also confirm this right on TCL's website.  HDMI does look a lot better than the OTA HD.  The sound quality is also decent relative to how small the speakers are.So why 3 stars-  Picture quality, color tone, and sharpness are simply not anywhere near what I get on say my 40" Samsung LED that was $480.  Nor is it as good as my kids 40" LCD Toshiba which is about $380.  I have tried tweaking every possible adjustment and although it does adjust the picture I simply can't find one that I would say is great.If you are coming from a non-HD TV to this I'm sure you will be happy, but if you think the avg of 4 stars on this is equal to 4 stars on the high end TV's you will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: needeen
Reviews.Content: Due to the price of LED tvs, I have been holding out on buying a new tv for some time. After researching on and off for a few months, I came across this TCL tv. I researched the brand and felt assured that it was going to deliver the basic features I want from a tv- HDMI ports for my blue ray and roku player, awesome picture quality, and an ultra-slim design. The tv came in an undamaged/unopened box and was quick to set-up in 20 minutes. There are not many features with the tv (i.e. no picture in picture etc), but that did not affect my decision. I also knew the speakers were going to be poor. No ultra slim tv can deliver dynamic noise like a stereo. We hooked the tv up to a stereo and muted the tv to get the sound quality we desired and have no complaints. It's a great entry-level tv and I highly recommend the tv at this price.

Reviews.Title: Great at this price
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This TV is GREAT. You just can't beat the price for this TV. Of course this review is relative to the price.Pros:Price is GREATThe Picture quality is GREATNicely Vivid and BrightIt is super thinHas a super thin bezelIt's really lightViewing angle is goodCons:Only 2 HDMINo hdcp (explained below)I didn't buy it sooner!Something weird when I went to hook up my Comcast box. It said my TV doesn't support hdcp which I googled and is High Definition Copyright Protocol. Basically some bs... I don't know if it was the TV or the old crappy comcast box. I needed the two hdmi ports for the xbox and the Blu-ray player anyways so I just used the component cables for the Comcast box. There is a work around though I think. When I unplugged it from my old tv and plugged it straight into my new tv (the TCL) it worked. Unplugging the HDMI from the comcast box, and plugging it back in, was when it threw the error. I assume because of this it treated it as a new connection and performed the hdcp check. I didn't do it but if i were to plug my old tv back in and then unplug it and plug the new one back in, I bet it would work.Bottom Line:You simply CAN'T get this picture quality, thin bezel/thickness, and decent amount of connections elsewhere at this price point.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: FirefighterCin
Reviews.Content: This TV is serving its purpose, but definitely lacks the picture quality I thought it may have. It's a TV that you should only get if you just can't hold off a bit longer to save an extra $100 or so. I'd say wait the extra time for something a bit more expensive. The quality is poor enough for me to regret not waiting myself.

Reviews.Title: My Television Is Defective :-(
Reviews.Author: Piff
Reviews.Content: I thought that I was getting a deal, but I received a defective television.  It turns on for about five seconds - showing the TCL logo - and then turns off.  This happened multiple times over the three days that we have had it so far.  There was never even an opportunity to get to the setup screen, and obviously not a chance to see any television stations. Beyond this, the build of the television is very nice.  It's slender and sleek and has a glass base that is different from the rest.  I am sure that many people will get a deal on a working television, but I'd rather not try again and again to get one that MIGHT work.  UPS is coming tomorrow to pick it up for return.  Amazon is always perfect with exchanging and returning items.

Reviews.Title: A great TV with low price
Reviews.Author: Lausannewu
Reviews.Content: I got the TV today. From various tvs, I chose this one with high quality and still low price. I am glad with its image and video quality. With my husband, we are both satisfied with this TV panel.We just met a small problem with screws. It is so difficult to rotate the screws inside. Even some screws can not put into the holes totally. I need some additional new screws to assemble the TV panel. I have wrote email to USsupport@tcl.com to ask for new screws. After the feedbacks, I will upgrade my review.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, no remote codes!
Reviews.Author: atvwife
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV to replace a Samsung that is less than 4 years old and already going to crap. Figured why spend a fortune if even the good brands don't last. Received order as promised and there was no damage to packaging. Had the TV up and running within a few minutes, and the picture is great for the price. Speakers aren't the greatest but we hooked it up to our surround sound and it's fine.Big problem - if you have DISH, there are no codes to program your Dish remote to work with this TV. We have tried every scan, code, etc., and after trying to find info online, it's pretty clear there isn't one that will work, so we now have to use two remotes because we can't change the volume or turn the TV off without using the TCL remote. I considered returning the TV but when I came back onto Amazon, the price had come down from $518 to $499, and it was within the 14 day price guarantee, so they will refund the difference. Can't complain about that.12/12 update - switched from Dish to Directv and not only can the Directv remote sync with this TV, but the HD picture is much clearer. I have no idea what differences are in Dish's equipment and Directv's, but the picture is 10x better with the Directv service!

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: bojaby
Reviews.Content: I received my TV and had it assembled and programmed in 30 minutes.  I am pleasantly surprised with the appearance and quality.  The set is razor thin with a very thin bezel.  The glass base is beautiful as well as very sturdy.  I own a larger Samsung and believe the picture quality on this set may be better.  This is the best TV you will ever find for the price.  Do not hesitate because you are not familiar with the brand.  I believe they make parts for Samsung.  The only con I found was with the closed captioning  option.  It appears you have to have it on at all times or only when muted.

Reviews.Title: TCL television
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: An excellent set for the money loaded with connections and a clear sharp picture.  Bought one for home and was so pleased with it that I purchased two more for my office

Reviews.Title: OK while it lasted...
Reviews.Author: SHDad

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2V3JTH2R0DLRUcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2V3JTH2R0DLRUcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:39 MinsI was skeptical about getting a TV for such a low price. I clearly saw that there were several good reviews and almost as many bad ones about quality issues that people were having. I decided to roll the dice. For the first 4 months every thing was good. Hard for me to say it was "outstanding" as there was a lot of pixilation with HD content (granted, this could only be seen if you were within 8 feet of the TV). For the price, nothing I would baulk at.After 4 months, the TV began to blank out (the screen turned to a fuzzy screen of "snow") for about 2 seconds and then it would go back to normal. At first, this would happen about once every 10 minutes. Now, 18 months later, it happens about once every 30 seconds and it is impossible to watch TV. I tried to switch to a different HDMI port and same thing. Tried running different devices (Blueray, cable, Roku) and same thing. (VIDEO: Note, that I am not changing the channel, turning the TV on/off, or anything like that. This is what I am viewing without messing with anything)The other issue I have is that the clock would not keep time. I would set it one day and the next day it would be approximately 20 minutes off and continue to be offset by 20 min every day. Really?!?! Kind of concerning. Makes me wonder if they can't get the clock to work, how is the actually TV going to work properly?I will be making a warranty claim on these issues as I am still under the 2 yr warranty. I'll post an update and let everyone know how that process goes. If you decide to pull the trigger, I wish you good luck. Seems to be working for some people...

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Amit Sepaha
Reviews.Content: Cons: Does not get into 1080 P in VGA mode. It is capable but does not report it to the OS. You can trick it into 1080 by attaching another1080 monitor to your computer and then connecting this TV to the computer without turning off your computer.

Reviews.Title: Love the low-profile style
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I am a diehard Samsung guy for my TVs, but I got this for my parents bedroom and they love it! I've used it and I'll say it is a great brand for the money. Given it's performance and great look, I'm surprised I don't see TCLs everywhere!Not as good as Sony or Samsung, but I'll say it's just as good if not better than LG, Vizio, Insignia...etc.I will admit the speakers are really twangy (just like all the other TVs), but it's an easy fix. Get a receiver and some speakers!Great buy. Great Deal.

Reviews.Title: Look good and fills a need for a 43 inch slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rojo Grande
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up in place attach a home theater unit to it. Also, the price was right along with no sales tax.

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Ive owned this TV for over a year now with moderate usage and thepicture still looks amazing. No problems yet, The speaker sound ok for being such a thin TV too. Its unbeliveably thin and light as well. I owned the TCL LCD before and loved that one too. I think the screen is made from samsung but not 100% I will be buying another TCL in the future! Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Great for viewing golf and all sporting events
Reviews.Author: cathy
Reviews.Content: Like the TV, just large enough for our den.  Would recommend it to family and friends.  Had it for just under a year and no problems.  Good product, looking forward to the Super Bowel.  Great size for a party of 10 friends.

Reviews.Title: TCL LE32HDE 5300 32" 720p Slim LED HDTV w/ 2yr. Lt.Warrenty
Reviews.Author: Airgun Junky "G.O.Skare"
Reviews.Content: Great TV best TV we have owned for that price ever, no flicking, sticking, glitching, twitching or any other icking things some of the other flat screens we have owned. We plan another one for next year only we are of course going bigger not a lot but probably 42"- 46". Has all the ports to connect the computer up for some Netflix or YouTube or HDMI even a standard USB port and a headphone jack. Sorry it took so long to review but we wanted to be sure we did the right thing. Very Happy Thanks TCL.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv til it breaks
Reviews.Author: Cesar Herrera
Reviews.Content: This is the second TCL tv I bought from amazon. The first one came with a defect and took 2 months for the manufacture to try and fix it until I got tired of waiting and got a return from amazon 4 months after the purchase.  The TV's look nice but are low quality. This 32 inch does not turn on anymore after only having it for a year.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 6 months. TCL wont warranty
Reviews.Author: Lisa Meyer
Reviews.Content: Stay away from TCL!!!! They dont stand behind the prouduct. TV's should last for years this one good for 6 months.

Reviews.Title: happy with purchuase not tv
Reviews.Author: T€M€
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item via warehouse deal, price was reasonable so pulled trigger. Unit arrived as promised in one day, but I got first shock after initial depackagning. Some screws missing for base mount, polystrene particles everwhere even between bezel and lcd panel.After taking photos of every mess I powered up and see what happens. First power up is fine, no burns and explosions :) I connected my laptop via hdmi for screen testing, image is very good no dead pixel. Than I packed everything back to my country. Since I live in a "PAL" country I expect some problems, but I am well avare of them, have several signal converters, multisystem dvd and sat receivers etc... When I connect my satellite receiver got some pinky and clouldy picture. Check the settings, try another one and another nada... Then connect a computer; vadaaa picture is cyrstal clear...I realised this tv can not process video signal properly. Sound is worthless to mention, tv is less far from garbage...But; I forget to mention my nice conversation with amazon csr. She gave me very very good refund for my issues, so tv sits above my computer as a monitor. After adding a pair of jbl external speaker, my girls are very happy with the result, I am happy to have 32" monitor for little more than a buck ;)

Reviews.Title: Good Value.
Reviews.Author: Patrick McPartlin
Reviews.Content: Very solid value in this set.I had my worries about not going with a name brand television set for my bedroom but I reasoned that I didn't want to pay for a chinese set that just had a brand name slapped on so I picked up this TCL set. Overall it has a very nice picture, and I barely notice the difference between this and a 1080p television. The difference is there but really not seen when just watching regular television. Definitely do not notice the difference between this set and a name brand 720p 32" (which my sister has), except for the price tag.It does have some light bleeding around the edges and when the screen is pure black it seems a bit blotchy but again for 95% of my viewing I really don't even notice it. If it's your main television and you watch a ton of tv or lots of dark scary movies, perhaps this is not the set for you. But if you just use this tv like I do as a bedroom set when you lay down for bed, it is perfect.Would recommend. Although it did come with one stuck pixel which is why I deducted a star. I can only notice it up close but now I know it is there, and it's in my head man, IN MY HEAD!

Reviews.Title: Would by again
Reviews.Author: Bigbellied1
Reviews.Content: Have had for over 1 year and works flawless in non climate controlled area. Have antenna, DVD, and VCR all running with it.

Reviews.Title: Thin, Small Bezel, Lightweight
Reviews.Author: Xanthene
Reviews.Content: Surprised by how small the bezel was around the screen.  Extremely lightweight.  Good picture without a lot of useless features.My only complaint is that when it is off the Power button has a 1/2 circle red light.  This would normally be fine but I have this in my bedroom and light is noticeable when dark.  Not bad enough to warrant a -1 star though.

Reviews.Title: Fuzzy picture
Reviews.Author: Andrew Basdeo
Reviews.Content: Idk if mine wasn't made well. The picture was fuzzy and I can't tolerate that. I read though some had really good picture. I returned this and got a samsung 32-inch. The samsung is good.

Reviews.Title: Great performance for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony Iannone
Reviews.Content: I am using four of these displays for video / CCTV monitoring in an office building. The monitors are sleek looking, have a good, sharp, bright picture, and have been in use for almost a year with nary a problem. These are not Samsung monitors - the quality of the audio is a bit lacking, for starters, but I have seen few LED displays with as good an image quality as these for such a low price. They work perfectly over HDMI from a DVI source at 1920x1080 (so they will work with almost any modern PC) and I also tested the built in ATSC tuner and found that it also works pretty well.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Robert Bragg
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my mother in law...it is easy to use and looks great. Perfect for what she needs it for. Great deal

Reviews.Title: TCL LE32HDE5300
Reviews.Author: Dan O'Connell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this based on other customers reviews back in Dec 2012, and it was flawless from the time I unpacked it. A couple minor peaks for my individual viewing preferences. As other reviews stated, it could use a great deal more volume, but I sit rather close to the screen so it is not a major inconvenience, but an external amplifier would greatly help on viewing certain movies and music performances. To date, Oct 2013 it's been completely with out fault. I highly recommend and an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Best Value I Could Find
Reviews.Author: Kristopher Wilcox
Reviews.Content: After months of searching for the best value I could find on a new TV, I finally bought this model (46 inch). It was significantly cheaper when I bought it (in March of 2013) than it is now (in October of the same year), but this does not surprise me. It seemed like a steal when I bought it then, and is still a good value at over a hundred bucks more now.Key features of this TV set include:A bright, LED-lit display with dark blacks and pretty accurate color reproductionA nice thin bezel, a cool solid-glass stand, and overall good stylingAn adequite amount of inputs, including two HDMI ports, VGA, AV, component, headphone jack, and a digital audio out portA quality remote (I figured the remote would be garbage considering what I paid)Undoubtedly, a lot of folks haven't heard of TCL, but don't let that turn you off. The company is much more common in Asia and Europe, and are really among the larger electronics manufacturers out there. Many of the products they import to the United States are marketed as RCA and other brands. All in all, the unit seems of good quality.You can pay a lot more for a Samsung or Sony television, but it's not going to be much nicer than what you get with this TV. For those looking for the most bang for your buck, this is definitely one to consider.

Reviews.Title: replaced our livingroom TV
Reviews.Author: S. Marchuk
Reviews.Content: We got this to replace an older LCD tv. This is a great improvement over our old setup. Can't complain for the price :)

Reviews.Title: Nothing but impressive!!
Reviews.Author: Chad Oberholtzer
Reviews.Content: We are very late entrants into the LED TV world, having managed with a monstrous CRT TV until 2013.  But we finally decided to upgrade, and we are absolutely thrilled with our TCL 46" beast.  Some other reviewers complained about the speakers, but they are more than adequate for us and project plenty of sound throughout our entire downstairs.  The picture is huge and clear.  The base is very stable, which is helpful with two munchkins poking at it and bumping into the furniture on which it sits.  The price was remarkably low, and I'm so glad that we made this purchase.  I have no idea how it compares to its competitors, which presumably have fancier bells and whistles, but I'm happy to recommend this one to anyone interested in a large, basic TV.

Reviews.Title: Way Better Than Expected!!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Blommer
Reviews.Content: This TV has such a great picture!  So clear and great depth and detail!  We can not be more please with this TV.We will buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: S. Plant
Reviews.Content: I bought this item on Amazon and it was about 25% less expensive than the current price which made it a great value as it was about a hundred less expensive than comparable TV's, however at the current price point it may not be such a great deal only because of the limited number of inputs it has available. We have to unplug the DVD player whenever we want to plug in the Wii.Overall the TV worked without hassle right from the beginning and we have had it now for a few months. The sound quality is marginal but adequate for us as the main viewers of this TV are under 4 years old and Barney and Dora don't really need high quality sound.This TV is also very thin and throws little to no heat compared to our previous LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: A surprisingly good tv.
Reviews.Author: lloyd
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this because of the great price. I could not be happier with that gamble. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent replacement and remarkable customer service
Reviews.Author: J. Gillon
Reviews.Content: I received this 46" tv as a replacement after a TCL 43" we had owned for almost a year started acting up.  The TV is great, just a little larger than the old one.  But there's a more important point I want to make: since there are so many complaints about TCL's customer service, I'd like to relate my positive experience with both Amazon and TCL.When the old tv started misbehaving, I attempted to contact TCL customer service.  My first call went right through and the service rep suggested I try something simple and, if that didn't work, call back.  It didn't work and I called back, and got no answer.  I tried again, and again no answer. Tried other numbers and email addresses I found on line and still got nowhere.  Discouraged, I finally called Amazon, and the rep I spoke with spent about 30 minutes with me on the phone trying to contact TCL and patch me through to them.  He was successful, and the service rep I spoke with (Kay Ann) was superb.  After a quick few steps to try to identify what the problem was, TCL decided I should return the TV for repair.  They shipped a box which arrived quickly, I packed up and shipped the TV, and from then on I received frequent emails and calls from TCL:  they received tracking info; they received the TV; they evaluated the TV and determined a replacement was warranted, but they needed a few days for inventory to arrive; the inventory arrived, but they did not have a 43" model, would I accept a 46"? And then the 46" arrived with very proactive communication from TCL every step of the way.I would definitely buy another TCL (I own three already).  The TVs lack many of the bells and whistles you find on more expensive sets, but they really are an excellent value.  And TCL really came through when I had a problem.  All-in-all, after a couple false starts, a far better experience than I expected.  Excellent, in fact. Thanks to Amazon and TCL!

Reviews.Title: TCL 46 Inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jaki J
Reviews.Content: Vibrant colours. Able to hook up computer to TV. Audio can also be heard through the speakers on TV if watching a movie via computer. Will recommended to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: great LED tv
Reviews.Author: R. Knowles
Reviews.Content: great picture and easy to use. instructions for assembling base were not clear, but using common sense was the answer. setup of configuration was easy and we were watching shows in no time. We didn't tweak the picture as it looked great with default settings.

Reviews.Title: TCL TV
Reviews.Author: Winston Butcher
Reviews.Content: Dear sir this television is the best I ever had the soft touch turn on and off is just what I was looking for , the quality is the very best, I am currently looking for a bigger sisz for my family room at the moment at the good prise I got this one at, I am very satisfield with this televison and I would recomment this TCL tv to every one I for got to mention the slimness of the Tv I really take away much of the space that was used before every one who come to my home is very impress with this television and of course I tell them where it came from, Very good job Amazon in selling me this television. Winston Butcher, Barbados

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Pat Seier
Reviews.Content: My son-in-law recommended this TV to me.  He has one too.  Great value, good picture and fits my needs perfectly.  I have it mounted on the wall above my fireplace.

Reviews.Title: Nice Television For A Great Price
Reviews.Author: Gregory F Thomas
Reviews.Content: I've purchased allot of TV's from LCD, LED to Plasma and this one proves that you don't need to buy a well-known brand name at a super high price to get a good quality TV. The unit has great color, easy to understand setup and controls, crisp lines, it's sleek, attractive and everything "the normal TV viewer" would want from a flat screen display. I bought this for my assistant and she absolutely loves it. She's an avid movie watcher, connects it to the standard viewing devices as well as her laptop - it has all the connection capabilities that you need. Overall she’s happy with the set, it was a great gift and with Amazon Prime she received it in 2 days. Good unit, Nice Picture, Fast Shipping and All At A Very Reasonable Price..

Reviews.Title: Warranty Support  Taking Care of Me
Reviews.Author: W. Self "Capt Bill"
Reviews.Content: 42" TCL TV purchased SEPT 29, 2012 developed vertical lines in screen May 2013.  Warranty support was OK'd with a picture of screen and proof of purchase. A UPS box for TV with prepaid shipping label showed up for warranty repair (good). Two weeks later I've been told the TV will be replaced, but the repair center is waiting for the availability of a replacement TV.  ... still no refurbished 42" TV available. Today a month since warranty contact started, I have been told TCL-USA will send me a larger screen refurbished TCL TV. The new refurbished TV will have warranty coverage to end of my original warranty. ... I'll update this review if there are any problems. I liked the original TV very much when it was working properly.  Good quality picture to my eyes and extremely low energy use.

Reviews.Title: Power Button
Reviews.Author: natalie villagomez
Reviews.Content: Power button gets stuck a lot.Okay for the price , shipped fast and was easy to set up.other then that its an okay tv

Reviews.Title: 46 TCL TV
Reviews.Author: kraig johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought this on amazon for 430.00.this is a fantanstic TV with great color and good soundThe 46 inch is very slim and only 44" wideIt fits where many standard 46 TV's will not.  A great buy!!!!

Reviews.Title: TCL TV
Reviews.Author: J B Young
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Took 15 minutes to unpack and set up.  Volume was not good but a set of old computer speakers plugged in solved that problem.  Picture is sharp enough for the general public.  Price was very good.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: john william pinto clemente
Reviews.Content: Excelecte led tv is a perfect combination of price and quality Good Holiday. its design is slim and under the tv is fine, its base is glass makes it very elegant

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Caesar Donahou "Vulok"
Reviews.Content: I don't write many reviews except for those few products that amaze me and this TV has done this.I bought this TV for video games and movies and that is all I can give an honest review on.  I also use a sound system so I don't really have a good opinion on the quality of the speakers.  With that being said I can say honestly I would be shocked if you could find a TV that had the same quality/size for the money.  A few minor notes that it is not a smart TV and there are only 2 hdmi ports.The image quality is great, the picture is crisp, bright, colorful, and responds quite quick.  It is light and thin as most tv's are these days.  I have a 360 and a PS3 hooked up to it now and both look amazing on it.  If I had to point to one reason not to get this tv it would be the lack of a smart tv feature, which as a console owner this is irrelevant to myself.  When I get another TV in the coming  year(s) I will look at TCL first and I would encourage anyone else to.

Reviews.Title: Good TV with good price
Reviews.Author: weyeonme
Reviews.Content: Very slim design, sharp picture, very similar or better than those TVs in $600 range.I spent a lot of time to study LCD/LED TVs before I made the purchase and am happy about my decision.

Reviews.Title: Not Reliable, Get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "RCCL fan"
Reviews.Content: Well,  the price was great, some people said it looked more high end then it is... etc etcAnd yes, the design is good, and the picture looks great.....WHEN IT WORKS.It works 80% of the time, but who wants something that works 80% of the time.A few days after installing it started to get a solid vertical white bar on the right side of the screen when it was first powered up.It would disappear after a minute or two.  It only happened sometimes, I kept trying to convince myself it was a fluke and would stop or go away.Well, it didn't it still happens, and only now instead of 1/10 of the screen being solid white bar now 1/2 of the screen is solid white.Then magically it disappears only now it takes longer than a minute or two.  Sometimes I have to turn it off 4 or 5 times.Problem is to get it "fixed" i have to pack it up and ship it back. It's professionally mounted on the wall in my kitchen, I don't even know how to get it down. It's a $400 tv. is it worth getting someone to take it down, packing, shipping, waiting, getting it back paying someone to install new one.It makes me just want to go get another one.Also, if you have tiro, forget it.  it's not compatible with the remote. I've called the manufacturer tried all their codes, NOTHING.It also has an unreliable audio setup.  sometimes i have to crank it up high other times it's on 10 and it's too loud.I have a sony lcd that's about 6 years old going strong, a samsung that's 4 years old and westing house that's 3 years old not a single solitary issue out of them ever.  This thing is just a few months old.  I'm disappointed.When it works, it works fine.... WHEN IT WORKS

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Arrived on Time, Item was exactly what I wanted at a Great Price. Yes I would recommend this product to others. Love the picture

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: ffemtva
Reviews.Content: Great TV. I looked for a good TV and this one bet my expectations. This TCL is not well known in the US but is a top notch company and makes TVs for other big companies. Best of all you get a 2 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, slim design
Reviews.Author: Spyros Michail
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I am getting and I am as happy as I was with the first one. The first one had a crack on the edge of the glass out of the box. Amazon replaced it promptly. Great TV and great customer service.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: raygin
Reviews.Content: Great color, great pic, great price. Would recommend it to anyone. Looks good watching netflix. Bought a different one for another room, would of bought two.

Reviews.Title: hedline
Reviews.Author: nonyabiz@not.now
Reviews.Content: Great picture, and it looks good too. Not a lot of bells and whistles but great price opf rtele this size.

Reviews.Title: What an incredible deal
Reviews.Author: William P. George
Reviews.Content: I was a bit afraid to purchase a 46" tv for under 400 dollars, sight unseen, BUT I am glad I did. This TV when used with an HDMI cable is crystal clear to the point that it almost looks like 3D. I have only had the TV for a couple weeks, but so far I am incredibly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: TCL Rocks
Reviews.Author: Jon Temple
Reviews.Content: Great tv--no problems--easy set up, works well with Roku--recommend highly...Just need the purchase order # so I can activate the 2 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Clear as a bell!
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV at a great price!  Picture is so sharp and clear, colors are vivid, and it's very easy to set up!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Had it for a few months now.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 46" TV about 6 months ago and I am very pleased with our purchase. The colors are great and the tv looks just as good as some costing 2x as much.  I am planning on buying another one for my son's room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Price
Reviews.Author: Luis O. Dasta "lando786"
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchase for the bedroom, we didn't need a huge TV or one with many features since we knew we would be hooking it up to a RoKu. We've had this television for 4 months now and it's going strong. Colors look good, there are a few color settings and you could also customize them if you want something better for you. I find it just right using the "Natural" setting but that's just me.The great thing about this TV is that it's really slim and lightweight so I'm pretty sure that with the right mounts you could have no problem mounting it to a drywall if you wanted (although I still have it on my dresser). There are mounts for Roku's out there, but I just use dual-sided tape and I don't even see the box or the cables so that's good.Picture quality is about what you would expect for this price point. I guess you could say it's "Good not Great" if you compare it to higher end TV's but if you're looking for a solid TV for gaming in a small to medium size room, it will do. The audio is pretty good as well, again nothing unrealistic in this price range, you won't get solid bass or deep voices but for what it is, it does it's job.I was actually pretty surprised as I was expecting a lower quality TV.At this price I'd recommend it for Kids, college students and for people in my case who are just looking to get a TV in their room even though they have a much better/bigger one in the family room.

Reviews.Title: First I bought the 39" version
Reviews.Author: Mary Jfitzpatrick "CrazyMary"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 39" 6 months ago. Liked it so much I received the 42" version a week ago. No problems with either one. The 42" does have some perks over the the 39". 42" has better sound, more ports. Both have a sleep function on the remote which I really like and do use alot. Both Verizon and AT&T; installers have been surprised at how quickly the picture refreshes when using their remote...I have nothing to compare it to, but they were truly surprised, in a good way.

Reviews.Title: A Glowing Rectangle of Godliness
Reviews.Author: Christian Perry
Reviews.Content: I'm a relative latecomer to HDTVs, and purchased this TCL in late 2012 after reading the glowing reviewsnon Amazon. As a thrilled owner I am proud to write my own.Who is TCL? Who knows! What's clear is that they make an astounding, near-flawless product at an eminently accessible price, backed by a solid warranty in case anything goes wrong. (Which for me, at least, has never happened.)I speak as a tech-savvy consumer but one's who's still new to the AV world. Here's the setup that I've put together, which costs less than $1000 -- even though it doesn't feel that way:- This TV. It's epically awesome; enough said.- Yamaha RX-V371 Receiver. This has all the ports you'll ever need for your consoles and peripherals, including 4 HDMI inputs.- Energey Take 5 speaker system. An amazingly-priced 5.1 speaker system delivering crisp, smooth, vivid sound.To this I've added a Wii, Xbox 360, BluRay player, and AppleTV. Everything shows up in vivid HD picture and face-meltingly gorgeous sound, and thanks to the receiver there's no need to swap cables ever.Adding an iPad into the mix, I can stream my entire music library through AppleTV to the sound system, while mirroring visualizers to the television. It's amazing.We live in the future, and godly home entertainment is more in reach now than ever before. This HCL delivers an outstanding visual experience through both its glistening screen and beautifully-designed form. Coupled with a receiver and sound system, it will replace whatever your current religion is and become your new focal point of reverence, awe, and worship.Recommended with intense enthusiasm.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, looks and acts like a name brand.
Reviews.Author: J. Pappan
Reviews.Content: PROS:- This TV is thin. It looks awesome on the wall when used with a 1.4" flush mount system. A friend assumed I paid big bucks for it.- The bezel is tiny, it almost looks like a picture coming out of the wall.- The picture is sharp and bright. I was very impressed.CONS:- The remote is bad, and may not offer universal commands for all remotes. Personally, I use a logitech 880 on this unit, which can be programmed no problem.- The speakers could be better, but it's not terrible.- For some, the lack of internet connectivity or "smart" features may be a negative. I don't care, because I have an Apple TV for all of that, which is $99 and does it better than any smart TV ever could.For the price, this thing LOOKS awesome. The CONS can be overlooked for the value, and the picture and aesthetics make up for it.

Reviews.Title: it is a fair deal
Reviews.Author: Chunmei
Reviews.Content: This TV is very thin, and easy to install. Relatively cheap. You have different signal input. the only thing i don't like is that when you use a USB, the TV can only recognize some format documents. The sound is not that good, you may need additional equipment to enjoy it. Then picture looks not very sharp, maybe it is the problem of the soure of the signal, not the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my mother, it's a great buy and she loves it.  It's ultra thin, would recommend for anyone looking for a tv. Was shipped within 2 days.

Reviews.Title: broken when recieved
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: when I received my tv today, the screen was cracked, obviously someone at ups had dropped it or carried it a little rough because it was broken. A new one is on the way, but from what I can tell it looks like an amazing tv, the screen is very slick looking, and not bulky at all. I thought I would need help carrying it, but it was a reasonable weight. The only reason I gave it 3 stars was because it was broken upon delivery. however I will be able to update my review in a couple days once receiving the new one.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: D. Durbin "Student of Poetry, Student of Life"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful size for the price! I have gone solely to TCL brand at my house, and haven't been happier. Super light and thin.

Reviews.Title: Best Budget TV on the Market
Reviews.Author: SaraBee
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical of buying a TV for $425, but this 46" model has been absolutely perfect for what I needed. I wall mounted this model and use it exclusively with an HTPC. The TV is very light and very thin and it is perfect for wall mounting. The thin bevel is also an added bonus. This TV may be cheap, but it certainly doesn't look cheap.The picture quality is also fantastic; clear, bright and sharp. They're aren't a lot of options for adjustment with the on screen menu, but I find it looks best on the "cinematic" setting. It works great running off my computer through it's HDMI out and has no issues playing any 1080i file I throw at it. It also looks great on the few games I've tried on it.The sound quality might bother some, but I find it to be better than I expected for such a thin profile TV. I use it in a small room and it suits my needs just fine. Even if you find the audio lacking, it's an easier fix to purchase external speakers than it is to have a TV with bad picture.

Reviews.Title: Cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Liam
Reviews.Content: The sound is lousy, but the picture is decent. It's a totally reasonable TV for the money. I have it in a bedroom with a Roku feeding it and it works great. The bezel is sleek and thin and it looks nice mounted on the wall.

Reviews.Title: For the money it's a great deal
Reviews.Author: John H Jones
Reviews.Content: Considering this TV is about $200 less than any comparable models.The first one I ordered had a cracked screen. Amazon had a replacement here in 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Paxton Grant
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a few months ago and I dont regret it its slim, well built, my only regret is that i didnt buy a 47'' instaed of a 32''.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Tanya Domingue
Reviews.Content: First of all love the fact that it only weighs 46 pounds! The slim design is so sophisticated looking and the picture quality is amazing! Glad we bought this even though it was a brand unknown to us!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Barmaster
Reviews.Content: We needed a TV for an exercise room and this looked like a great value.  It looks great, picture is just fine and couldn't be more satisfied based on what we paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a good deal but. . . .
Reviews.Author: Dunny
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome. Easy setup and everything, my kids even helped me. Super bright and great picture, even better than the other more expensive tv's I was looking at. Then after having it for 60 days the tv went out. just turned off and wouldnt turn back on. i called the manufacture, all the phone number do NOT work. I called Amazon customer service, they also tried to contact the manufacturer, they were unsuccessful. Amazon was absolutely amazing and they have refunded my money and i sent the tv back. this is a warning that if this happens to you the manufacturer is no help! Amazon customer service was amazing. HUGE KUDOS Amazon. No kudos to TCL!

Reviews.Title: Great Looking TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Vyper33
Reviews.Content: Was looking for replacement TV for the bedroom and since I already had a Roku box did not need a Smart TV.I purchased this TCL television for its price, it looks, and overall good ratings.When I received the television I was not disappointed.The look of the TV looks high-end.  It has a glass base with a brushed metal looking bezel.  The bezel is very thin and TV overall looks very sleek.The picture quality to me looks great watching streaming movies in HD.  Much better than the 7 year old LCD TV I had in the room before.  I don't have a Blueray player in the bedroom so I can not comment on the quality of the picture in that format.The reason I give the TV 4 stars instead of 5 is because the sound quality is average to below average.  My 7 year old LCD TV sounded much better than this TV.  Sounds very tinny as if you are listening to a transistor radio.  Not a very big issue for me since this is for a bedroom and I don't listen to the TV very loudly.  However, for those using as a primary TV definitely hook it up to your AV receiver or get a sound bar.  There must be a trade-off between thin bezel design and speaker sound, since this is a common issue with most LED TVs reviews I have read.The second reason is the number of ports.  Although it states is has both component and composite inputs.  They share the same audio inputs so you can only connect the audio of 1 device.Last reason is when you switch between inputs, you have to press the input button very quickly when you get to the USB input source otherwise it puts you into another menu tree.  The only way to get out of that menu tree is if you have the original remote.  Kind of a pain when your primary remote is from your cable box or DVR.However, you can't beat the price for this 46 inch slim TV that by far looks better than an other budget TV I have seen on the market.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: cfast
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandparents, It was an unknown brand to me but the price was right. Tv showed up in good condition installed easy, has a good picture and sound. Very satisified so far, for the money you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: marshal bosley
Reviews.Content: this is a great tv for the price. its really bright and my ps3 looks great on it when im gaming

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: What a great value, Amazon! My son wanted to buy a different brand from Best Buy with his Christmas money, then I spent time researching the reviews on Amazon and found this one for the same price. Excellent TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: doubleE
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this TV and would recommend it to anyone. I have had several people surprised at how great the picture of the TV is from a brand they have never heard of before.  As I have said the picture is great, and I am happy with the sound of the TV as well.The only drawback I have run into with this TV is that it seems to block the OTA signals to our antenna. We moved the antenna across the room from the TV and that has helped.

Reviews.Title: very good HDTV
Reviews.Author: joe petrone
Reviews.Content: looks good in my living room the thin bezel makes to screen seem larger than 46 . The picture is very good

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: Ethan White
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this TV. Clean, bright picture, decent sound, and awesome price. I do not notice any motion blur.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy!
Reviews.Author: Phil K
Reviews.Content: Great value with this TCL, which I own three TCL tv's now. This one was a great deal at a great price. Very smooth picture, slimline as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: The first tv arrived and one of the HDMI inputs was not working.  I got it replaced by amazon very quickly and got the new TV mounted to the wall.  The picture is bright and clear, price was great, and my cell phone is just about as thick as the display!

Reviews.Title: new TV
Reviews.Author: Fang-Yu Chen
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice TV, considering the price! Nice image quality, and size (I have 46 inch one).The only thing I think might be a con is the sound quality, which is not as expected. But it is a TV, not a theater one.I am satisfied with the TV so far. I still give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for a great price!
Reviews.Author: John H. Foley, D.D.S.
Reviews.Content: Looking for a sharp-looking TV at a great price?  Look at TCL.  TV doesn't look cheap and is super light. Thin bezel.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME ENERGY SAVER
Reviews.Author: sitysue2
Reviews.Content: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TV ! ENERGY SAVER SAYS UNDER $9 A YEAR TO RUN & VERY SLIM & LIGHTWEIGHT MODEL WITH AWESOME PICTURE ... WE LOVE IT & PRICE W? WARRANTY IS AMAZING !

Reviews.Title: A very good TV to consider
Reviews.Author: Nelangel
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd TCL TV that I buy, and like its predecessor, this also provides a poor sound, besides that, the volume is not enough, so you definitely have to adapt it amplifiers, besides this, due to their high response time (20ms), it is inevitable the formation of "blur" in some images, which are not many, but we know, for the rest, its image quality is extremely wonderful, extraordinary colors spigot, so you can enjoy your videos in FULL HD 1080p  by HDMI input (the movie AVATAR beautifully reproduced it in 1080!, so great DEFINITION!!), your angle view is superb too!!, played a variety of formats via USB (JPG, JPEG, AAC, Windows Media Audio -wma-) and in terms of appearance is undoubtedly one of the best TV I've seen stylized!, and that is extremely thin as the frame that surrounds it ....In conclusion, this TV would be hard to beat if it had a better sound system and there were no shadows, so an amplified audio system is mandatory, and with respect to the 'blur', well, nothing can be done (I have a Wii, but did not try there games, I'll do that soon)...*********************************************************Este es el 2do TCL TV que compro, y al igual que el anterior, este tambien ofrece un pobre sonido, además de eso, el volumen es bajo, por lo que sin duda hay que adaptarle amplificadores, ademas de esto, debido a su alto tiempo de respuesta (20ms), es inevitable la formación de "blur" en el procesado de algunas  imágenes, las cuales no son muchas, pero es notorio, en cuanto al resto, su calidad de imágen es sumamente maravillosa, con resalte de colores extraordinarios, por lo que puede disfrutar sus videos por HDMI en FULL HD 1080p (la película AVATAR en 1080 la reprodujo maravillosamente!!), su angulo de vision es extraordinario también, reproduce una gran variedad de formatos por USB (JPG, Jpeg, AAC, Windows Media Audio -wma-) y en cuanto a la apariencia es sin duda uno de los mejores TV estilizados que he podido ver!!, además que es sumamente fino al igual que el marco que lo envuelve....En conclusión: este TV sería difícil de batir si contara con un mejor sistema de audio y no se produjeran sombras (blur), por lo que un sistema de audio amplificado es mandatorio, y con respecto a los 'blur', bueno, nada puede hacerse (tengo un Wii, pero no probé allí los juegos, lo haré pronto)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Caligal
Reviews.Content: Wow this is a great flat screen! I absolutely love it! Very nice quality thin tv! The picture is great and is very nice looking! What a amazing price for a flat screen this size!!! It was shipped very fast and packaged excellent!! The best purchase I've made on amazon yet! They also gave the option for free shipping and comes with a 2 year warranty.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV so far.  Caution OTA users
Reviews.Author: JS "JS"
Reviews.Content: Had this TV for 6 weeks now and so far pleased with it.  I won't repeat what others have posted as positives as it is a great TV for the $200 price I paid.  Only cons to note:  Remote is over sensitive at times and jumps past channels when you try to change channels.  Not a big deal but annoying at times.  Also the OTA tuner is weaker than the other 2 TV's we have, so you need a better than average signal for the OTA to bring in the channels.  We finally installed a better antenna in the attic to get a stronger signal and now it works fine.TCL 32" LED LE32HDE5300.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Adams
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat apprehensive, as others before me were, with purchasing an off-brand television set. The TV came in with no cosmetic issues, was really easy to put together, it delivered exactly on time and has great color.  Watching HD channels and Blu-ray dvd's are pretty amazing. The color pops and is very bright. All in all, the only complaint that I have is that I had to do quite a bit of adjusting when I received the TV on the sharpness, brightness, the tone etc., but when I finally got the settings just right I was extremely satisified.  I couldn't be happier for the price I paid.  Great TV and I will be sure to reccommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound
Reviews.Author: DeereLover
Reviews.Content: As of this writing, we've had this TV for about 3 weeks.  This is our 2nd TCL TV and we are happy with both of them so far.  This model was an open-box from the Amazon outlet store.  I could not see any blemishes and it works great.  Our only complaint is that the sound/volume isn't great.  This TV is wall-mounted in our kitchen and is about 12 feet away from our center island.  It's difficult to hear unless the volume is cranked way up high and then it begins to crackle.  We have connected a set of computer speakers to the headphone jack and it's much better.  If you are going to sit close to this TV then the volume probably won't be an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Stewart Gibb
Reviews.Content: Good picture but the volume is not high enough for my wife.  Connecting to the Sony box needed me to think.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ron Miller
Reviews.Content: This was my first flat screen purchase and I am very pleased with this product. The sound leaves a little to be desired but overall a great product.I had bought several items from Amazon but was a little skeptical about the shipping of this sensitive item. I received it excellent condition in 2 days instead of the 3-5 that was predicted.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: I'd buy another... maybe
Reviews.Author: William Bliss
Reviews.Content: This TV has some most excellent features: 2 HDMI ports, Component video, composite video, PC (VGA) port, and a USB port so you can put files on a flash drive to use on the TV. It has a coaxial SP/DIF output, too (Sadly, no optical).  The menus are easy and intuitive, and the volume balancing works really well! (a big deal for me). It's very light weight, and the price is definitely a plus!The picture is mostly great except when watching standard cable -- then it's pixelated pretty noticeably (not enough to make it impossible to watch, but impossible not to notice).  In its HD modes, the picture is fine.The worst thing with this TV is the placement of the ports, and the fact that the audio-in is shared between the component and composite video...The input ports:  The 2 HDMI ports are easily accessible on the side of the TV.  Unfortunately, unless you have spent the money to purchase some 90 degree or rotating HDMI cables, you cannot plug them in and route them without them being seen from the front of the TV.  It's annoying to have to see them, or spend the money to replace perfectly good cables...The other input ports are better placed for visibility, but not so good for accessibility.  The cable in port faces down, and is in a recessed part of the case -- which means you have to bend the coax pretty sharply just to get it in.  Putting that much stress on the cable while trying to screw it in was enough to have me swearing in frustration.  Likewise, with the PC video input.  The composite and component video/audio ports were not a problem -- however, because I already had a device using the component video and audio (and, as I noted above, the audio is shared with the composite) I had to plug the audio from my WII directly into the amp rather than running it through the TV with everything else.The annoyances aren't enough to make me want to return it -- but they were definitely annoying.  Would I still spend the $230 on it again, knowing what I know now?  Probably.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be more satisfied!
Reviews.Author: jerry b
Reviews.Content: I've had the TCL LE32HDE5300 for two months and love this TV! This is my second TCL and the picture quality is as sharp and beautiful as my Samsung. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Eric J Hansen
Reviews.Content: For those looking for a great HDTV at a very reasonable price I highly recommend the TCL. It was shipped to me in one week, and took less than 15 minutes to set it up. It has a great picture and average sound quality. I wasn't too concerned about the sound since I have a separate system for that. All in all I would recommend this to any others looking for a very nice budget HDTV.

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: Wilson Huitink
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of this brand before but it had god reviews.  The TV has an excellent picture and looks very nice with the thin border.  Just started using it and it seems very good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: For this price you just cant beat this TV.  I bought it for my daughter's bedroom and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: amazing television
Reviews.Author: honorio
Reviews.Content: The tv works great and the image is amazing. The shipping was excellent.Thank you.The image is great and I would recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: High quality product
Reviews.Author: Trevor Tompane
Reviews.Content: TCL is on its way to becoming a renowned brand. Great price for this thing, great picture, high quality materials...it exceeds the expectations for the price. As others have said, the sound is not so good (true for any TV this size) so just hook up some speakers or a sound bar. Definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. missing 1 piece
Reviews.Author: Brian Iverson
Reviews.Content: I was very scepticle of buying this brand of T.V. especially buying a T.V. over the internet. I was for sure I would have had some trouble when I got it and found that the boxing looked like someone had taken a flippin sludghammer to it. I was surprised to open it and find no scratches or anything on it and got it out and assembled pretty easily just needed a second person to hold the base up while i scewed it in. But after it was all assembled I noticed there was one screw missing from the backboard and it was no where to be found. I checked the other screws and ALL of them were loose. Not a big problem, just had to tighten them which any 6 year old can do. Having to do this I was expecting the display to turn on and look funny but I plugged it in and the red light came on for the power and so I turned it on. Turned on and to this day looks great! The only thing is that the sound is terrible, I was not worried about this though as for the T.V. quality makes up for it emmensly. I got my logitech speakers hooked up and it turned out to be an awesome setup. Overall picture quailty great, sound sucks, shipping was exceptional since I had to make small tunes here and there upon arrival but it did arrive on time.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: LizM
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv for our bedroom and think it was a great purchase! The picture is clear, the size is perfect, as is the price.

Reviews.Title: Best pre-setting picture, best price and hopefully it last forever.
Reviews.Author: LC
Reviews.Content: watch couple hours a day to watch TV/Drama/Movie. NO PROBLEM. The picture quality is perfect. use it as a monitor for my laptop.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Y yu
Reviews.Content: It's a great product. Very good resolution with many ports. xbox, Blue-ray, computer line, Roku, and cable can be all hooked up at the same time, so I don't have to unplug different cables. I'm willing to give it one extra star for the price. One little anecdote for entertainment: I didn't find the back bracket initially, and I complained to Amazon and TCL. They promised to send me the missing piece. When I was ready to throw foam away after the call, I noticed one piece was very heavy. You know what, I found the bracket embedded in the foam and I had to call them again to cancel the shipment.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture..
Reviews.Author: S. Leilua "Sassy"
Reviews.Content: Great TV slim and great picture.. purchased ours in December so far enjoying it in our bedroom.  Never thought I would have a great looking television in my bedroom.  Love it, love it , love it~!!

Reviews.Title: I was afraid to order an off brand but this thing is seriously great!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Larkin
Reviews.Content: Everything worked perfectly - great picture, great tuner, slim design.  I was really hesitant to by an off brand I'd never heard of but took a chance on this because of the price - I kind of wish I'd bought two now considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Amilio
Reviews.Content: Except for the audio which is weaker than what was expected, I'd say it is worth the price. The design is really good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: William Bowen
Reviews.Content: I'd definitely say the screen quality goes up against the big competitors like Samsung and Sony, and the glass bottom gives it a great look.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV, thx
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: A good looking TV works good on my q-see cams, games and all, I got the wall Mount Swivel Articulating came with everything to do the job.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture, great quality
Reviews.Author: Lisa Kilhefner "scootchic"
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific 32" TV.  The picture quality is really great with the LED technology.  I had never heard of this manufacturer and was uncertain after reading some reviews, but it is really nice. Colors read true.  Love the glass stand.  I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a fantastic value!

Reviews.Title: function well and easy to operate
Reviews.Author: Qing Ouyang
Reviews.Content: It is a pretty good purchase at this price. The package arrived intact. The TV is thin, light weight and easy to set up. The image quality is great. I think the sound is ok.  The only thing that I can complain is some sockets are a little bit difficult to plug in.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Nick B. "Nick B."
Reviews.Content: Occasionally I have found this TV on Amazon for only $199.  I have now purchased 3 of them.  For that price this TV is awesome.  It does not have fancy bells and whistles, but the picture looks nice and the bezel is nice and thin.  I would suggest this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: PowerBookG4
Reviews.Content: This T.V is great! Works wonders with my Xbox 360 S! Easy to set up, well constructed, not cheap. The LCD seems like it was a Sony! Great and Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: L. Cosgrove
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tv.  It came in record time, not a scratch on it.  I gave it 4 stars for 2 reasons.1.  The sound is really tinty and no matter how I manuvered it I just couldn't get it to my liking.  I will be purchasing a sound board for it.2.  The directions didn't come with any kind of recommendation for a wall mount so I bought one to fit the size and when I got it home it did not fit the tv.  If you buy the one that is recommended by Amazon you can't go wrong.  The tv was easy to hang once I got the right mount.I used it in my bedroom and it is the perfect size with a GREAT picture.

Reviews.Title: decent tv
Reviews.Author: Lee Lehman
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a decent tv.  Not exceptional, but ok for an extra.  Seems to be a good deal for the price.  We'll see how it holds up.  One we paid $200 more for lasted just past the 1 yr warrenty.

Reviews.Title: very good over all
Reviews.Author: Jiacheng Guo
Reviews.Content: i use this tv play xbox and watch shows, it is a pretty good item, and get here faster enough!!!

Reviews.Title: The stand is defective
Reviews.Author: Lemon Drop
Reviews.Content: Just got my tv. The stand itself is missing 2 out of 6 gel mini-pads it stands on. Not gonna make a big deal out of it and will invent something for TV not to be wobbly.The TV itself works good and setup was super-easy. The picture is great, the sound is no Samsung, but decent. Would've put 4 stars if it wasn't for defective stand.

Reviews.Title: Good TV!
Reviews.Author: Erikas Sineokis
Reviews.Content: Very good TV for the money, if not the best that could be bought for such a price. Very good picture that has enough adjustability to fit the eye. Had no issues as described by some previous reviews.

Reviews.Title: Very Early to Rate
Reviews.Author: T. Johns
Reviews.Content: So far (2 weeks after receipt), the television is great.  Picture and sound have been good.  No complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: tv review
Reviews.Author: Emil J. Eder "EJEder"
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with picture.  Sound leaves something to be desired. HDMI connections stick out to side of tv as does power cord.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Like it
Reviews.Content: This seems to be an excellent TV.  Light, good picture, good sturdy attractive base.  The best deal we've seen for the price.

Reviews.Title: Visual Surprise
Reviews.Author: Dan Borrell
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box the quality of this HDTV set is simply amazing. Not only is the picture simply amazing , the design and look of the TV is quite nice. It was a breeze to set up. This is a deal that should not be missed. I would gladly recommend this purchase to family and friends anytime.

Reviews.Title: Amazing T.V.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Herker
Reviews.Content: The T.V. came as fast as they said. It was in great condition and all the parts were there, took me a little bit to realize the plastic connector to the glass stand was in the styrofoam though, but thats my bad. The television looks amazing. Its noticeable that its an edge lit led, but the picture looks perfect. The sound is also great. However, I did upgrade my computer from a old box screen to this. But even so, I say this is a great buy and would definitely  buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Peter tarach
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a gift and unfortunately I was one of the unlucky few that got a bunk unit. To make matters worse I shipped it to Canada for Christmas for my brother.Called TCL and after some mediocre customer service they said they would send me a new part and a technician would show up to fix the TV. Two weeks passed and nothing so I called and found out that they can't do anything for me since the TV is in Canada, which is fair. Too bad I didn't know that the first time I called.Luckily Amazon was really awesome about returning the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Lisa Norwood
Reviews.Content: This is a really great tv. Very good picture quality, very slim and for $199 its a really great deal.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Laurienzo "TV Addict"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV on 12/27 and received it the next day!  Had it up and running in our daughter's bedroom in about 20 minutes.  Absolutely no problems so far.  TV itself is streamlined and sharp-looking.  Picture is great, especially what is being streamed from our blu-ray wifi player.  Overall, great value for the cost of this gem.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: Way better than the other TV's same price range, sharp picture, could use a better sound. Overall not bad at all for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my bedroom and I really like it.  I also like the fact that  it has a two year warranty on it. For the price it's a pretty decent tv, the picture is good; the sound could be a little better, but overall I,m happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture
Reviews.Author: nathaniel petty
Reviews.Content: This item arrived very fast! The picture is good! The speakers not so good, but good luck finding something in this price range with good speakers. It is as advertised. Very happy!

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe Quigg
Reviews.Content: Not a bad tv, however audio seems a little hollow.  Wife says it is because I'm use to the surround sound on our other tv.Picture seems a little dull for being an LED tv.  I'm comparing to a Samsung LED tv (that is $100.00 more than this one)Overall I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Angel D. McCorkle
Reviews.Content: Can't get the color right I keep trying to adjust it but when I try to it won't work right.

Reviews.Title: tcl 32 in. slim
Reviews.Author: Robert Houdock
Reviews.Content: wow this model is a steal, best picture i have seen on a 32 in. yet ,great looks ,lightweight, don't hesitate.. I feel like my tv isbetter than everyone else's. Very impressive!

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: Carleen in Madison, WI
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv, easy to set up - can't beat the price on a tv of this size.  Would buy again.  This is the 2nd TCL tv we've purchased- the other was smaller and also a great price at the local Menards.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tv
Reviews.Author: Deanna Pugh
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the tv overall.  I am not sure why but when I hooked up my DVD player the color lost some of it sharpness.

Reviews.Title: Great lower cost TV
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Casad
Reviews.Content: TV shipped quick worked just as described and was a great buy I believe some of the bad reviews where do something during shipment or turning it on while it was cold would buy again hct is a Korean company thats now is able to sale TVs here due to the free trade agreement we just signed good company quality items just like any other off brand TVs such as vizio and many others

Reviews.Title: Awesome value for this TV
Reviews.Author: Jennette
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV for a couple of weeks but so far I absolutely love it.  Beautiful picture, good sound, and great settings options for both.  I definitely recommend it!UPDATE 01/23/13: After a month, the only complaint I have is that after hours of watching dvds or blu rays the picture gets lines through it during movement on the screen. Resetting the DVD player or PS3 seems to fix the problem right away.

Reviews.Title: TCL 46" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Scott Simas
Reviews.Content: alot or bang for your buck. when i hooke it up with the HDMI cables the piture was awesome. Will not sync up with Comcast remote. No codes available at this time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Value
Reviews.Author: FULI CUI
Reviews.Content: Stylish look and good speakers for a flat TV! I am using it to watch hd content. The picture quality is superb!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE My New TV!!!
Reviews.Author: J. West
Reviews.Content: Amazing price for this brilliant set. I was afraid I would suffer buyer's remorse, but, instead, I feel like I stole it. Great picture controls, great remote, loads of options and SVGA hookups. Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Rashidi Williams
Reviews.Content: Unpacked this TV and it played beautifully with no bugs. Just upgraded from a large Tube box so any upgrade would have appeared spectacular.  Sound was great also.

Reviews.Title: everything was better then expected
Reviews.Author: Silviu Pavel
Reviews.Content: I love it, it came in a good packed box and the tv was not damaged. The tv screen looks huge because of the slim bezels. There is some leakage of the led but it's only when the screen is black. It is very slim and I just love it. It shipped in 2 days. For only $230 I love it. Will update!

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: JSN
Reviews.Content: The TV is fantastic.  The price was even better.  I would recommend this LED television for anyone who would like a great picture in HD.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Boston Man
Reviews.Content: Purchased the tv during one of the black Friday specials and I couldn't be happier. It's got a nice screen and I couldn't believe how light the tv was. I'm definitely happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: excellent TCl TV
Reviews.Author: I. F. Jenny "jenmar"
Reviews.Content: This TCL tv, 46 inch, has a much bigger screen than the one I had before, 32 inch, and the colors are brighter which makes it an extra pleasure to watch tv now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Price
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Griffith "Griff"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV mostly because of the price.I am very pleased with the TV it works wonderfully for what I need. Quality picture and the sound works well enough for my needs.

Reviews.Title: great tv 4 less
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: great picture great price looks good.2 year warrenty took away any worry about buying a brand i had not heard of .speaker poor but  a sound bar fixed that ,i would buy TCL again.1st flat screen for me.as good as any of my friends name brand tvs

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Victoria E Aurand
Reviews.Content: Other than the fact I i think the sound is a little rattly from time to time,  I have been quite pleased with this tv. I bought it for use in my bedroom. It is just the right size, the picture is quite nice/ It was the least expensive led of that size I could find at the time other than a seiki the Sears folk were selling. The picture on that one was less than strllar, so I took a chance on this one. So far, so good

Reviews.Title: I'm loving my new tv
Reviews.Author: M. L. Johnson "m johnson"
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any issues with it so far. The picture is very clear and the sound is working great for me. I had no problem connecting any of my gadgets (surround sound, bluray) and its the perfect size. Its not overly bulky and its not very heavy. Its perfect if you don't want it to be the dominant television in your house.

Reviews.Title: Needs fulfilled
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I thought this tv was going to be comparable to some of the lower end tv's out there.  I was wrong.  This television far exceeded my expectations.  The picture is very good and I can't imagine spending more for a different tv.  I'm no tv buff but from walking around stores and looking at the televisions there, I made the right choice.  They only downside to this tv are the speakers.  They are weak.

Reviews.Title: Product works & does its job
Reviews.Author: mego
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. Not the best quality picture I've ever seen and it takes a little bit to turn on, but a great product for the price. I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great product for the money
Reviews.Author: Hank
