Reviews.Content: TCL is a nice brand for home TV. Bought the product two weeks ago, so far so good. Use it everyday for Xbox Kinect.The only complaint is the price was $518 two weeks ago!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: michaellus88
Reviews.Content: Great affordable tv. Wish it swivelled though.Picture color and sound are Solid. Only two hdmi hookups but the value is great.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Mainer John
Reviews.Content: This product exceeds my expectations. The price seemed too good to be true and I know it got a few negative reviews, especially about the sound, but I took a chance. I thought I could always add external speakers if needed. The application is in a large classroom at church to show videos for Sunday School classes. The picture is clear and bright with no dead pixels and the speakers are more than adequate to fill the room with no distortion. I'm 100% satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Mctravum
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy if you are looking for a cheap in cost but good quality tv.  Amazingly clear picture, easy set up and best of all, I don't feel like a wasted a dime in the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Shockingly Crisp Picture
Reviews.Author: William S. Lawrence "west_tex_1"
Reviews.Content: The idea I got was that, if the TV survived the "burn-in", I would love it.  ANd that's exaactly what happened.  I bought two of them, and they are amazing.  The pictures are absolutely perfect!!  I simply could ask for nothing more.  Shipping was rapid, the items were new in the box and well-packed; wha't's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: William Carson
Reviews.Content: This TV was an upgrade from an 32 inch lcd that I have had for about 5 years. The TV looks great, the bezel is thin and very sleek looking. Furthermore, you get what you pay for, the picture is good, but not amazing. The blacks on the 1080p are a bit lacking. I would also would have liked at least one additional hdmi port, there are only 2 on this model. However, I do not think you can beat this tv at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Just got this tv a couple days ago and Best tv for the price so Far!!!
Reviews.Author: Silastees
Reviews.Content: This tv came in the mail about 5 business days which is amazing and once I opened it I did not expect the tv to be so thin. It's super thin and I love that it feels like the whole tv is made out of glass so be very careful when you take it out of the box an try not to bend it, Just to make sure nothing bad happens so get another person. This is my fourth flat screen television an I love this one the most. The picture quality is extremely sharp, make for you get a hdmi cord for the higher resolution. That makes a whole big difference with this television. Over all great sound, perfect sharp image, and it's perfect for movies an video gaming. Buy this and you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: I love my new TCL slim line flat tv.  Great picture, two year warranty and looks very stylish with narrow bevel around screen and glass stand.  I haven't seen anything like it at this price!  Costco had a recent offering that I swear was $500 more, and it wasn't delivered to my front door in two days!The speakers could use a boost due to their back mounting, facing away from the screen, but my surround sound system resolves that issue.Buy one, you will really like the value and the TV!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV
Reviews.Author: M. Terwilliger
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely fabulous.  The picture is crisp and sharp with beautiful colors.  The tiny frame around the outside is great as well, makes the picture look much bigger than other tv's I've seen that are the same size, very modern looking.I can't say enough about this TV, I'm so glad I decided to buy it, a great value for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Blyth
Reviews.Content: This TV looks fantastic. Stands up to other TVs I've been looking at in stores that were hundreds of dollars more. No smart tv options - but a PS3 or Roku should do what you need. My only problem with it is that I haven't been able to find the universal remote code for it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Wilbur P. Ahn Jr.
Reviews.Content: Iam very happy with TV. Excellent picture and color,especially on H.D. channels. The only thing Iam not happy with is the auto volume control.The volume surges high and then low when its not supposed too. I simply turned it off and use regular volume setting. I have had it for about 2 weeks and very pleased. I would reccomend and buy again. The sound and speakers are  okay for me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the Money
Reviews.Author: D. Federwitz "Dthegiantfed"
Reviews.Content: Really can't say enough about this TV.Crisp image, light weight, ultra thin, decent styling, easy setup, color adjustment, and the remote is the only disappointment but I use a universal remote so non issue.Would have liked to see a optical Audio out from the TV but that is a small point and only for over the air TV.All of this for $350!!! (Got mine from Amamzon Warehouse Like New condition)

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Wentworth
Reviews.Content: HD looks good Analog looks crappy..... DVD Movies look good also.I prefer my plasma but the tuner crapped out of it and I didn't want to spend a lot on a TV right now.You get what you pay for. =)

Reviews.Title: Great looking television, well made by solid company
Reviews.Author: Gus Polidor
Reviews.Content: This television looks great, with an extremely thin bezel. This unit would cost hundreds more if it had a name like Samsung on the front.  Instead, TCL chooses to put money into quality parts and pass it on to the consumer instead of spending on marketing.  Putting the stand on the bottom was very easy.  The screen looked great immediately upon plugging it in.  There were certainly no problems with the company, as they are highy regarded as reputable within the industry.  Great television, great price, great company.  Don't be swayed by detractors, give it a try for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent competitive tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: Cautious Shopper
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv after getting a recommendation from a friend. He was dead right, the Picture is Excellent and plenty of ports and plugs for all accessories. Quality components and straight forward setup. Price is well under what this tv is worth from another brand. Then there is the 2 year warranty which I don't think ill need but I am assured with. Overall don't let the Brand hold you back. I have not however used the sound on the tv much as I have a surround system I connected from day one.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Brigitte A. Crawford "BoardCEO"
Reviews.Content: Has a nice screen and was a snap to install and set-up.  It even linked into the Satellite system remote so we still only have one remote to manage.  Great TV and shipped really fast.

Reviews.Title: Wrong stand screws
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: The stand screw is too big to fit that hole, and as I called customer service, there is no one available for the support, I was quite disappointed with that.

Reviews.Title: Looks awesome out the box, not so great when u turn it on!!!
Reviews.Author: Raffa "Raffa"
Reviews.Content: First off, I did not buy this TV from Amazon. When u see it displayed on the store it looks awesome at a glance. Really thin bezel more than most other tvs, even the expensive ones. All around really thin futuristic, clean looking TV. Has easy setup, good basic functions. The HD works fine, has plenty inputs/outputs.The real problem is it has just too much light leakage on the edges. It is normal it might have some, but it's just too much. Does not happen on brand TVs. I'm no TV technician and I just suppose its is because the edges on the screen are just to thin or most probably just poor quality lighting/panel. Maybe they have sacrificed picture quality for a thin bezel. When u watch TV the most important thing is picture quality. U can easily notice when the screen goes dark, the edges, especially the corners light up big time!! Blacks look grey and that's NO GOOD, it kills the contrast. When there is a high color image on it you can see the colours on the edges look whiter than at the center. It advertises high contrast ratio but it's really far from it in reality.I tried calibrating it many times in different settings and could never get it to look well... How it should look!I went back to the store to ask for an exchange and the one they had on display looked exactly the same even with the high light environment in the store. This eliminates the possibility that the unit was defective as they all look the same. It is a budget TV but it's no reason to sacrifice image quality. They should have sacrificed some useless function. Also the remote looks kinda flimsy. Works fine but could look way better.In conclusion you can get a way better, brand name TV with the sames specs for $50-$80 more. That's what I did. I went for a Sony BRAVIA KDL42EX440 42-Inch 1080p HDTV which I paid a $40 differential and I'm really happy with it. It's an awesome TV. What I really expected. Blacks look black, brights look bright, minimun leakage.BRAND NAME DOES MATTER!

Reviews.Title: TV is great, however came defective
Reviews.Author: Timothy Michael Dexter
Reviews.Content: Upon using the TV i noticed a black line going down the screen, which wasn't that noticeable unless u had a blue screen on or really looked for it. However, with a small issue now it could become a larger one down the road. I don't blame the company, probably just a defect or it was damaged in the shipping or while in a warehouse. I am replacing it and will write a more detailed review when I have used it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Rob, Mechanical Engineer, CWI
Reviews.Content: Excellent 32" TV.  Picture quality is very good almost excellent after I finished adjusting the settings.  Yes the speakers are small, but what do you expect from a 32" TV?  I cannot tell a difference between this and higher end sets.  It is most certainly more than I expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I already had a larger TCL tv for the living room that I liked, so I ordered the 32 inch for the bedroom. The sound is pretty poor, but the bigger problem is that they didn't include a part to attach the stand to the tv. After several calls trying to get in touch with the company to replace it, I was informed that the US side of the company was waiting for the Chinese side to deliver the parts, had no idea when they might come, and acted indignant that I thought this was not an acceptable answer to my problem. I can't find the extra part anywhere on the internet and now I may have to return the tv and wait again for a new one. Next time, buying Samsung.

Reviews.Title: I thought this would be a decent deal...
Reviews.Author: double m "double"
Reviews.Content: I thought the many positive reviews of this TV would make it a fairly foolproof purchase. Not so much. I received it and the screws that should attach the base to the TV would not fit. They were also made of extremely cheap metal, so the head stripped EXTREMELY easily. So, once you cannot mount the TV on the base, and have no good place to "lean it" or otherwise rig it up to work, you're out of luck.I called TCL customer support and, of course, had a terrible experience. The first person took down tons of personal info, TV information (serial #, model #, order date, blah blah blah) then said, "Sorry, I can't help you. Here's another number to call."  I call the new number and this woman takes down ALL of my information again, then let's me describe the problem. As soon as I do, she tells me, "Sorry this is the wrong department. Let me transfer you." I get transferred. Repeat process. New woman tells me "Sorry, let me transfer you." I get sent to some guy's voicemail. I leave him a long message. I call back. The next customer service rep takes down my info AGAIN. They transfer me after a long wait and I get disconnected. I call back. They take down my info. They transfer me to the guy's voicemail.Sensing a customer service pattern here?Eventually I get through to a human being who seems like they can help. She keeps me on hold a long, long time and eventually returns to tell me: "Sir, you'll need to go to a hardware store. We are out of the correct screw to ship you."  Wow. I ask, "Seriously? You're joking right." And she replies, "I wish I was..."So, I have a TV that I cannot use, and customer service that will not help me. What a great deal!Let's face it: You're thinking of buying a TCL because it's inexpensive, relatively speaking, and gets decent reviews. But remember that someone is still trying to make a profit. It's cheaper because they cut corners where it counts: build quality and customer service. In the next many years you will have this TV...are those the areas YOU want to see corners cut?I'm giving this a day to see if I can still reach SOMEONE useful at TCL. Then its return time for me.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price.
Reviews.Author: John Hayes
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and the box was intact. It's light. I carried it up stairs single handed. On opening the box I found the set in perfect condition. There are few features on this TV. It is very thin and the picture rocks. I was hoping for 3d in the menus like the Hiseense but not to be. Easy setup. The remote is a bit of a clunker. I recently also bought a 32 haier ultra slim and the remote on that is sleek and it has a great picture too. Now the haier is on guard duty with my cctv dvr 8 camera security system. This 46 inch is my new bedroom TV and it's just right! The summer olympics never looked so good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but hit or miss.
Reviews.Author: Darrel D. Kincaid
Reviews.Content: bought it about 2 months ago and so far, everything worked great right out of the box. My buddy at work wanted one, so after I hooked mine up and made sure there no problems, then I order him one. Right off the bat, the sound system was defective on his, very tinny and distorted. He didn't want to hassle with warranty, so I told the set has one thing that not all brands have, a headphone jack, just plug in a set of computer speakers, for about 30.00-75.00 ,still keeping the cost of the TV under 500.00 and giving it sound system quality.

Reviews.Title: TCL would not honor their warranty, robbed of $648
Reviews.Author: Tab Numlock
Reviews.Content: I bought the previous version which went bad after 13 months. They refused to honor their warranty claiming I dropped it (I didn't and I don't have kids). After months of trying to get satisfaction from Walmart, I threatened to stand on the public sidewalk in front of the store with a protest sign. That quickly got me a $400 gift card.Edit: Took my $400 gift card and used it at Sam's to get this TV (Amazon lowered their price to match). Not bad at all. No flaws so far. Not fancy like the one that broke which had swivel, a logo that lit up and lots of HDMI ports. Simple, thin and light. Bright, sharp picture and decent sound. They added a sleep timer feature to the remote. Has an earphone jack if you want to use cheap computer speakers. I'm covered for 5 yrs with Sam's $40 extended warranty since I don't trust TCL.

Reviews.Title: maybe good
Reviews.Author: Terrence McHugh
Reviews.Content: time will tell if it is a good purchase...I just have it on and using it, I hope I don;t have any problems.

Reviews.Title: Picture very sharp, few out jacks, no remote control code
Reviews.Author: kirk johnson
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with sharpness of picture.  Sound okay and comparable to our LG tv.  Would like more output jacks in back to hook up our stereo, and "TV ear phones" -- the earphone jack on the TCL automatically shuts off the speakers, which defeats the purpose of TV ear phones for my hard-of-hearing father.  No remote control codes in owner's manual so that we can use our universal remote control with our DISH system.

Reviews.Title: Just Do It!
Reviews.Author: Fred Wicker
Reviews.Content: Great color, great size, and great price.  I did a lot of research and a lot of price watching and this unit just kept popping up.  When I got it home, I couldn't have been any happier with the picture it is incredible.  The speakers aren't the greatest, but if you attach your own, like most do, it's not a problem at all.Overall, you can't go wrong with this LED.

Reviews.Title: poor quality sound
Reviews.Author: stan
Reviews.Content: Great picture. The speakers are tinny. Am trying amplifier to see if that helps. Low price is not alawys a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: florida
Reviews.Content: This item is great at the price point sold for $200. not the best for use as a computer monitor, If windows is set to the right settings it works very well, but not superb like 1080p tv sets. 1080p sets look superb on any settings in windows, no adjustments needed, text look sharp and clear at all sizes on 1080p. To get good viewing text on this 720p set, the size in windows must be set to Large or Medium. Overall, great buy at this price point. item is relatively thin, feels strong and sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: PARoss
Reviews.Content: Price attracted me to this item.  I've had no problems with it.  Picture quality is good. But watch amount of natural lighting hitting screen. And sound is fine. Again, considering its cost, I'd say I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I love it and My family is also very like This product is valuable, and the price is not expensive, worth buying

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the $$$$
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 to place in the kids rooms with basic cable. Got them mounted and hooked up and so far so good.  They use very little energy and do not get warm while on.  Nice picture for basic digital cable (I have not viewed them in HD but I am pretty sure they would be great.)  The sound is not the best, however it is more than adequate for my application. My kids love 'em so I guess that's what is most important!

Reviews.Title: I like my item. Good price . Speedy delivery.
Reviews.Author: Halina
Reviews.Content: I love it because is looking very tin, small, and save room in my grand daughter apartment . She was very happy with the Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Works. Looks nice.
Reviews.Author: Kalli
Reviews.Content: It does everything I want it to do with no problem. I appreciate that it turns itself off when left unattended with nothing playing for a while.

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Emrys
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV December 8th, and it arrived December 11th. I unboxed it and the first thing I did was plug it in to make sure it functioned. One thing I have to mention is that it has no HDCP support, so if you're hoping to use HDMI with your cable provider (primarily Optimum), don't press your luck. As of yesterday (12/26), the TV suffered a software glitch. Now there is a blank screen with no sound, and a red flashing status on screen. I am returning this and getting a different brand. I will not be buying another TCL. Ironically, I do have a 40" TCL I bought a year ago that works perfectly (except for a dead pixel it came with). Other than that, buy this brand at your own risk (peril).

Reviews.Title: CHANGE MY MIND ABOUT THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Rubinsky
Reviews.Content: AFTER 3 MONTHS  .. HAVE SOME ISSUES WITH TV NO SCREEN ONLY SOUND .. CALL SERVICE DEPT .. HUNG UP ON ME 5 TIMES THEY DONT TAKE CARE OF CUSTOMERS  LEFT ME WAITING ON CALL 25 MINUTES LAST TIME UNTIL 5 PM ... THEY CLOSE AT 5PM

Reviews.Title: It is not what I expected...
Reviews.Author: Ronny C.
Reviews.Content: I would expected a much better quality for a 1080p LED HDTV... There is not a clear, good qaulity screen view on this tv...I'm very desappointed with this purchase and I do not recommend TCL for a good LED TV

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Languini84
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV because the reviews all seemed good and it was within my budget (a low budget). The fact that I could get such a high quality LED TV for this price is pretty impressive. I was slightly concerned about 2 things. Some people were getting damaged TV's... but amazon has an amazing return policy so no biggie. Second was the sound quality. Well, I got my TV in 2 days, plugged it in and it looks amazing. Picture is better than my other higher end TVs. The sound isn't amazing, but it sounds pretty good to me. Overall I would highly recommend this TV even if you have a higher budget.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: barb wright
Reviews.Content: We had a little trouble attaching the base. Screws didn't screw in easily.  Very heavy glass base.  Looks great.  Picture is fine and sound isn't any different from the Visio that died after 2 years and cost twice as much.  I wish my Direct TV remote would work with it to turn it on/off & volume but it doesn't.  Perhaps if I had a newer remote the code for it would be there.  Overall great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Received all broken
Reviews.Author: anormalbuyer
Reviews.Content: I received mine today. The screen was all broken. There were multiple cracks on the screen (box was intact though). I am returning it but learnt my lesson, shopping online for few items is such a PIA.

Reviews.Title: It works fine.!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo J. Oliveros "JAVIMEJ"
Reviews.Content: I have this LED TV 32 "a week ago. Configure it easy. Mount the support base of the unit is really easy. It is lightweight and thin. The picture is good. The difference is seen in the HD TV, where LED technology makes a difference. the sound is good. not upset and I think it's nice. Service AMAZON.COM shipping, as always, unique. Arrive on time. ****One element to build the basis of coupling with the TV is in one corner of the protective polystyrene, used for packaging. Watch this. the first time I could not find them - haha haha - silly but true*****Something really interesting is the ultra-thin edges and / or frames on the screen. I have another 720 dpi 32 LCD TV and bought this to be LED, low cost, but also because my old LCD that works well, is truly great edges and the bottom has an additional extension to the speakers. It looks big, very big compared to the TLC Led 32. When I see the image of the new LED-TLC-32, appears the image smaller. It is an optical effect but one gets lost. Then put them in separate rooms and collate the times when I see one or the other, I learned to appreciate the image and the size of the new TLC. The same question I do for sound. Where are the speakers? The sound is really at the high standards for the 32".

Reviews.Title: My favorite TV so far.
Reviews.Author: Lair
Reviews.Content: Even though it's a 720p there is something TCL does in order to get a much better picture than any 720p that I have seen.

Reviews.Title: arrived as basically trash for the front yard.
Reviews.Author: leviday
Reviews.Content: Great Price but i guess you get what you pay for. Tv arrived with packaging intact so no foul play on shipping. Took the tv out of the box turned it on and the remote doesnt work to get past the intial setup. I went and and bought a logitech. still same problem. its like its not responding to any remotes. the ir reciever oin the tv must be broke. going to try and contact customer service.

Reviews.Title: Todays intertainment systems
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Rowe
Reviews.Content: I like the size of the screen. I like the size of the picture. I hope the picture is good and i get good life from this model.

Reviews.Title: It's an old adage, but you get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: W. Fairchild "Amazon Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tv to anyone on a budget and not interested in true quality. The tv is flimsy, yes, when I picked it up I was worried the frame would snap. My tv had white ghosting on all black screens, and I had trouble adjusting the settings permanently...and I am a self proclaimed tech geek.I actually returned mine, and am saving up for a better brand, but for some this tv should suffice, but if I were you I would be concerned for how many years this tv will operate.Picture was ok, but not better than my 2 yr old 60" DLP.

Reviews.Title: Affordable Entry-Level
Reviews.Author: wolfster "Kong1"
Reviews.Content: Fine entry-level unit for bedroom, kids' room, etc.  I did extensive online research about TCL and the unit itself, all of which seemed very positive (use of a Samsung panel, for instance), so given Amazon's tremendous return policy I felt it was worth checking out.Limitations: takes time to warm up before displaying best image, came without on-board software to enable using cable unified remote, and unless you are ready to also buy a soundbar you will only get small, "tinny" speakers.I did return it - hassle free - and ordered a different manufacturer's set that overcame the few drawbacks of the TCL.BTW, if you are as concerned about environmental issues as I am, I was very pleased that the LED power consumption put out virtually no heat. I would absolutely consider another TCL for my future purchases.

Reviews.Title: Hardware lacking
Reviews.Author: robert m williams
Reviews.Content: You think you have a good deal when really find out what you payed for......Unacceptable. The product was lacking proper hardware....
